channel.description: wats the command for spawning nnpcs? plz tell me

mclovinscape, that’s indeed an easy way, but when the one that spawned logs off youre npc will dissappear.

item.title: How do i spawn npcs
item.dc:creator: @mclovinscape mclovinscape
item.description:
@mclovinscape wrote:

or if you dont want them there forever do ::npc 2745 (jad) and it will spawn, and wont respawn so its pretty cool lol i spawned abunch of cats at my pk box.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i spawn npcs
item.dc:creator: @THELUKESTA THELUKESTA
item.description:
@THELUKESTA wrote:

                                                   FOLLOW DIRECTIONS EXACTLY

1:Open the moparscape folder
2:Open the file titled Hybridscape
3:Open the file titled Autospawn
4:Make a new line at the bottom and type (without the quotes) "spawn = " (spaces are inportant…)
5:After the equals and space type the npc id (to find open up the file titled npc in the Hybridscape folder with note pad and hit ctrl+f to find your npc
6:After typing your id then hit tab and enter your x and y coordinates with 1 tab in between each one (coordinates can be found by going into moparsacpe hitting start server then standing where you want your npc then typing “::coordson” like you are going to talk to someone in runescape…copy those into autospawn how i told you)
7:Hit tab yet again and type 0 tab again 0 tab again 0 tab agai 0 tab again 0 tab again 1
8:Next hit tab (big surprise :eek: ) and type in a description for the npc so you can easily understand what it is
9:Hit save then exit
10:Go back to the npc folder and find your npc
11:Go to the far right column and if there is a number besides 0 there leave it and if there is a 0 erase it and type whatever you want your npc’s hp to be
12:Go to the moparscape folder and click on the aryan folder
13:Now click on all the dos files and let them run and hit any key when they tell you to (they are very fast =D)
14:Open up moparscape start your own server and play!

If issues persist add me on msn and/or email me at lucaspargeter@hotmail.com that is my msn and my hotmail so yeah lol that took me like 20 minutes to type this (+ the older 1 but that was hard to follow)

Read full topic
